name: Apotheosis (8_Man)
description:
Myths and Legends have existed since the dawn of mankind. They are passed down in our written and oral histories as vital parts of our culture. Set in the middle-ages, this narrative simulation is one such myth. One that takes you through the story of an individual who goes from nothingness and strife to apotheosis and release. Here, the journey matters just as much as the destination.  

Controls: 

SPACE = Jump

A / LEFT ARROW KEY = Move Left

D / RIGHT ARROW KEY = Move Right

Credits:

This Game was made in two weeks for the Buddy Up Jam 2022: Summer 2022.

Ariana LoBrutto - Audio

Vincent John (VBJ Gamedev) - Production / Game Design

Adel Adam (Ozymiandias) - Narrative Design/Writing

Thomas Orchard - Unity, Programming and Production
